attributes.action: Mr Robert Newbold and Mrs Irene Newbold
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are against the closure of any departments of St. Richards Hospital in Chichester. This facility is vital in this area with congested roads, an elderly population and much house building going on and more planned for the future

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
